items.title: The Most Interesting November Historical Fiction Releases
items.description: From a tortoise who witnesses history to a sapphic Victorian romp, these are the month's best historical releases.

items.title: How to Reach Your Reading Goal with Two Months of the Year Remaining
items.description: With two months left in the year, here are some strategies for squeezing in a little more reading, plus book recs to help you hit those goals.

items.title: 7 of the Best New Nonfiction Books of November 2025
items.description: The importance of Black bookstores, a man travels back to home to Palestine, law-changing cannibalism, and more.

items.title: Don’t Leaf Without Raking in November’s New Releases
items.description: There are print versions of popular webtoons, adaptations and expansions of stories from other media, and lots of sweet romantic adventures.

items.title: 8 Literary Horror Novels
items.description: You’ll find the depths of a mother’s grief, a psychological snow-covered road trip, and a classic haunted house story, for starters.
